title: Rural population share in France 2006 to 2018
summary: This is a line chart with an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Share of the rural population, containing a total of 13 data points.
In general Share of the rural population has fallen over the Year.
Share of the rural population is slightly decreasing from 2006 to 2018.
The steepest decrease occurs in between the Year 2014 and 2015.
The highest Share of the rural population, of value 22.6 was reached at Year 2006
The lowest Share of the rural population, of value 19.5 was reported at Year 2018
